message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product that has been thoroughly tested and refined. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. It's a steal!
Since I have no information about the product's quality, I will pass this round to gather more data for future decisions.

Many of my previous customers have been very satisfied with their purchases, and I'm confident you will be too. Plus, think of the prestige and status symbol of owning a product from me!
Although I appreciate your assurance, I still don't have enough information about the product's quality. I'll wait for more data to make a more informed decision.
